text.title: Formula One driver Jules Bianchi dies aged 25
text.head: Formula One driver Jules Bianchi dies aged 25
Sources

list.item: AP. "Jules Bianchi dies from injuries suffered in 2014 Japanese GP crash" — ESPN , July 18, 2015
"Jules Bianchi dies nine months after crash in Japanese F1 GP" — Autosport , July 18, 2015
Tony DiZinno. "Jules Bianchi dies at age 25, his family confirms" — NBC Sports , July 17, 2015
Pablo Elizalde. "Jules Bianchi begins rehabilitation therapy in French hospital" — Autosport , December 30, 2014
Matt Beer. "Ferrari expands young driver academy" — Autosport , March 6, 2010
